definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: descent, slope; abs. ´[[מו]] Mic 1:4 + 2 t.; cstr. [[מוֹרַד]] Jos 10:11, Je 48:5; —

descent, slope, as designation of locality Jos 7:5, Jos 10:11 (´[[בְּמ]] [[בֵּית־חוֹרׂן]]; both JE); [[חׂרוֹנַיִם]] ´[[בְּמ]] Je 48:5; + [[חׂרׂנַיִם]] [[בַּמּוֹרָד]] ins. in 2Sa 13:34 LXX We Dr; in gen. [[כְּמַיִם]] [[מֻגׇּרִים בְּמוֹרָד]] Mic 1:4.
[[מַעֲשֵׂה מוֹרָָד]] 1Ki 7:29 work of descent, i.e. hanging-work (VB).
